title: 2-in-1 Teaspoon Clip
subTitle: A spoon has never been so useful

marketingArguments.title: Designed for Tea & Coffee
marketingArguments.speech: Simple, design & efficient, this spoon will quickly integrate your daily life. Over is the time, looking for a way to close the tea or coffee beans bag.

marketingArguments.title: Take the right amount
marketingArguments.speech: Just use your spoon. Its 20cl cup just measure the right amount of coffee beans, tea or sugar for a delicious cup every time.

marketingArguments.title: Robust and design
marketingArguments.speech: Their timeless, stainless steel design with a 4 colours choice is made to last for decades. The strengthened steel body and spring won't let you down.
